viaduct.travel.drop_denied: Dropping while riding is not allowed
viaduct.speed.change.end.correct: change Speed to %s ticks per chunk
viaduct.speed.changed.toofar: too far away, end speed change
tooltip.logisticpipes:viaduct.usage: Right-click on all viaducts with dyes to change the color, change transparency using wool or glass, and only for Basic Viaducts, adjust light level with glowstone dust and remove it with a brush. Can Stop the Travel with /viaducttravel stop tostart
tooltip.viaduct_facade.desc: A decorative cover for pipes and cables
tooltip.viaduct_facade.usage: Right-click any pipe or cable to apply the facade. For compatibility, additional blocks/pipes/cables can be added via config. Only applicable to blocks with a smaller hitbox.
tooltip.logisticpipes:viaduct_linker.des: Connector viaduct used as start and goal
tooltip.logisticpipes:viaduct_linker.usa: Right-click to open GUI, shift+Right-click to open ID screen.
tooltip.logisticpipes:viaduct_detector.u: Detects players passing through. Has a 3-second cooldown.
tooltip.logisticpipes:viaduct_speed.usag: Right-click to change speed (ticks per chunk, default 32 ticks) hold shift for higher steps. Shift+right-click with an item/block to set ID. Multiple boosters with the same ID change the speed together.
tooltip.pipe.usage: Place it on containers and make a pipe network, only usable in loaded chunks.
tooltip.pipe_extract.desc: Item pipe Extractor, placed on container to extract items
tooltip.pipe_extract.usage: Still Very very very very pre pre pre WIP this can crash lol.
pipecraft.commands.travel.stop.onlyplaye: only plaxers can use that command
